mapper.select: SELECT temp.id, temp.create_by, temp.create_time, temp.delete_flag, temp.update_by, temp.update_time, temp.user_a_id, temp.userAName, temp.aFileUrl, temp.aNickname, temp.user_b_id, temp.userBName, temp.bFileUrl, temp.bNickname, temp.content FROM (SELECT cr.id AS id, cr.create_by AS create_by, cr.create_time AS create_time, cr.delete_flag AS delete_flag, cr.update_by AS update_by, cr.update_time AS update_time, cr.user_a_id AS user_a_id, u.username AS userAName, u.file_url AS aFileUrl, u.nickname AS aNickname, cr.user_b_id AS user_b_id, u2.username AS userBName, u2.file_url AS bFileUrl, u2.nickname AS bNickname, cr.content AS content FROM springboot.chat_record cr LEFT JOIN springboot.user u ON cr.user_a_id =u.id LEFT JOIN springboot.user u2 ON cr.user_b_id = u2.id WHERE (cr.user_a_id = #{userAId} AND cr.user_b_id = #{userBId}) UNION SELECT cr3.id AS id, cr3.create_by AS create_by, cr3.create_time AS create_time, cr3.delete_flag AS delete_flag, cr3.update_by AS update_by, cr3.update_time AS update_time, cr3.user_a_id AS user_a_id, u3.username AS userAName, u3.file_url AS aFileUrl, u3.nickname AS aNickname, cr3.user_b_id AS user_b_id, u23.username AS userBName, u23.file_url AS bFileUrl, u23.nickname AS bNickname, cr3.content AS content FROM springboot.chat_record cr3 LEFT JOIN springboot.user u3 ON cr3.user_a_id =u3.id LEFT JOIN springboot.user u23 ON cr3.user_b_id = u23.id WHERE (cr3.user_b_id = #{userAId} AND cr3.user_a_id = #{userBId})) temp ORDER BY temp.id
